text: == Events == * The Town on Queen Anne's Creek, North Carolina is renamed Edenton in honor of North Carolina Governor Charles Eden. It is later incorporated in 1722. * The Tuscarora fled North Carolina as a result of European colonisation * Edmond Halley appointed Astronomer Royal * The Academia Real da Historia is founded in Lisbon, Portugal * Jonathan Swift begins Gulliver's Travels * Emperor Kangxi announced that all western businessmen could only trade in Guangzhou.
